Open Movement devices are miniature, embeddable, open source sensors developed at [http://di.ncl.ac.uk/blog/open-movement/ Newcastle University, UK].

* Devices
  * [AX3 AX3 Movement logging]
  * [WAX3 WAX3 Wireless accelerometers]
